name: Gotta Moon
description:
Gotta Moon is a 2D platformer that takes place in space!  Game Controls  WASD keys to move Spacebar to jump Left Mouse Button to dash Left Shift key to climb R key to restart To switch between movement systems, press 1, 2, or 3
(1 for basic, 2 for polished, and 3 for distinct)

Movement system is constructed from improvements to the base movement provided by Mix and Jam that was inspired by Celeste. 

 Credits 

Solomon Bell, Joe Frumenti, Alex Xie, Benjamin Chavez, Casey Chen, Graydon Simons, Jessica Huang, Malachi Maldonado

CMPM 170 | Group 21
